AboutMe.introduction: Hi there! I'm Derek and I'm just a trainee web developer.

first.description: I'm currently working as a full stack web developer in Saint-Gobain, where I develop and maintain internal applications to improve the efficiency for the workers.

second.description: I was selected to work in Ireland to improve my English with the Erasmus+ project where I enhanced my language skills and my IT skills too.

third.description: I worked as an IT assistant at Forum Calafell, where I helped maintain computers and websites, and I also managed social media, uploading content every day.
